org.ipdr.collector.log
Class CollectorLog

java.lang.Object
  org.ipdr.api.log.LogHandler
      org.ipdr.collector.log.CollectorLog
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class CollectorLog
extends LogHandler
implements java.io.Serializable

A simple implementation of logging, that outputs to stderr with time stamps.

See Also:

CollectorLog

public CollectorLog(java.lang.String linePrefix)
The constructor.

Parameters:
linePrefix - A string to prefix on each output line (handy for things such as the "progress" callback for CollectorSetupManager, to allow distinguishing a set of log outputs).
